Section.Catchline: Applicability or inapplicability of Florida Insurance Code provisions to title insurers.

Subsection.Text: In addition to any other provisions of law applicable to title insurers, title insurers are subject to the following provisions of this code:

Paragraph.Text: Section 624.406(3) (title insurer must be a stock insurer).
Section 624.407.
Section 624.408.
Section 624.411.
Section 624.608.
Section 625.031(4) (nonadmitted assets do not include certain properties of title insurers).
Section 625.051(5) (title insurers exempt from usual unearned premium reserve).
Section 625.111.
Section 625.330.
Section 626.9541(1)(h) (rebates prohibited; title insurance).
Section 627.401(4) (limited applicability of part II of chapter 627 as to title insurance).
Section 628.151.

Subsection.Text: The following provisions of this code do not apply to title insurance:

Paragraph.Text: Part I of chapter 626 (insurance representatives; licensing procedures and general requirements).
Part II of chapter 626 (general lines agents; qualifications and requirements).
Part III of chapter 626 (life insurance agents).
Part IV of chapter 626 (health insurance agents).
Part VI of chapter 626 (insurance adjusters).
Part I of chapter 627 (rates and rating organizations).
Part III of chapter 627 (life insurance policies and annuity contracts).
Part IV of chapter 627 (industrial life insurance policies).
Part V of chapter 627 (group life insurance).
Part VI of chapter 627 (health insurance policies).
Part VII of chapter 627 (group, blanket, and franchise health insurance).
Part IX of chapter 627 (credit life and disability insurances).
Part X of chapter 627 (property insurance contracts).
Part XI of chapter 627 (casualty insurance contracts).
Part XII of chapter 627 (surety insurance contracts).
Chapter 629.
Chapter 632.
Section 624.4095.
